definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
chemical industry, abbr. to 化工[hua4 gong1]

sentences.english: This is the website for International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 这是国际理论与应用化学联合会的网站。

sentences.english: We also do import and export business in chemicals and agricultural products.
sentences.chinese: 我公司还经营化学产品和家产品进出口的业务。

sentences.english: The application of chemical oil displacement agents for high temperature and salinity reservoir was prospected.
sentences.chinese: 分析了高温高盐油藏用化学驱油剂的应用前景。

sentences.english: Mosquito bites can be prevented by spraying the body with a chemical containing DEET.
sentences.chinese: 蚊虫叮咬，可阻止含有避蚊胺喷洒化学物质的身体。

sentences.english: The Rapid Displacement Heating (RDH) cooking process has been developed by Beloit Corporation as an energy efficient pulping system.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了快速置换加热间歇蒸煮化学和技术的原理。

sentences.english: Silver-coated carbonyl iron powder was prepared by using electroless plating method.
sentences.chinese: 用化学镀法，甲醛为还原剂，制备镀银羰基铁粉。

sentences.english: The second chapter makes contribution in chemical fiber for Qian Baojun science and technology.
sentences.chinese: 第二章为钱宝钧在化学纤维研究方面的贡献。

sentences.english: A low-solids mud in which there is no clay deflocculant chemical.
sentences.chinese: 不含粘土解絮凝化学剂的低固相泥浆。

sentences.english: What is more, the author also tries to construct the senior chemistry teaching model of developing autonomous learning.
sentences.chinese: 作者还尝试构建了高中化学自主探究教学模式。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To analyse the chemical composition of volatile oil from the leaves of Glycyrrhiza Inflata Batal.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析胀果甘草叶的挥发性化学成分。

sentences.english: Chances are it contains phthalates and are out gassing chemicals.
sentences.chinese: 它非常可能含有邻苯二甲酸盐，且正在挥发化学物。

sentences.english: These rocks have similar petrochemical compositions, mineral constituents and rock-forming tectonic settings.
sentences.chinese: 这些岩石有相近的岩石化学成分和成岩构造环境。
分光镜之于化学的革命。

sentences.english: Well, what do we know about extremes of chemical reactivity?
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我们对化学反应的极限有那些了解呢？

sentences.english: He's a pre-eminent authority in the field of bio-chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 他是生化学这个领域最杰出的权威人士。

sentences.english: A new brightener for electroless nickel phosphorous alloy was developed.
sentences.chinese: 研制开发了一种新型的化学镀镍光亮剂。

definition: physics and chemistry/to govern and educate
